name: ElevenLabs
purpose: AI text-to-speech and voice cloning for video voiceovers
description: Advanced AI voice generation platform. Used for creating voiceovers for video content, presentations, tutorials, and educational materials. Supports multiple languages and custom voice cloning.

actual_remote_helpers_usage.primary_use: Voiceovers for Video Content (BZ-V, Design Portfolio Videos)
use_cases: generate custom sound effects for video transitions
create layered sound design for viral hooks
create voice-changed audio for viral content

steps: Select appropriate voice from library (professional, conversational, etc.)

typical_workflows.task: Clone Team Member Voice for Brand Consistency
typical_workflows.time_estimate: 1-2 hours setup, then 5-10 minutes per use

typical_workflows.task: Automated Documentary Voiceover via GLIF Workflow
Create Sound Effects and Character Voice for Viral Video Hook
steps: Generate custom sound effects from text descriptions (e.g., 'warp', 'speed ramp', 'alien noises')
Preview and select best sound effect variations
Download sound effects as 48 kHz WAV files
Export original audio from video editing software
Select or design custom character voice (e.g., 'blue alien, quirky voice')
Import sound effects and new voice into video editor
Layer multiple sound effects (3+ tracks) for richer audio
typical_workflows.tools_involved: ElevenLabs (Sound Effects Generator, Voice Changer, Voice Design), Premiere Pro

integration_with_other_tools: After Effects - Import audio for video composition
Premiere Pro - Video editing with voiceover, sound effects layering, viral hook audio design
Manus AI - Combine with autonomous video generation
Gamma AI - Add voiceovers to AI-generated presentations
GLIF - Automated voiceover in AI workflow pipelines
VAYU 2.2 - Voiceover for miniature documentary videos
Seedream - Narration for tilt-shift video content
Sora - Add voiceover to AI-generated videos
Kling - Voiceover integration for video content
Veo 3 - Custom audio for AI-generated character animations
Midjourney - Sound design for frame transition videos
Nano Banana - Audio for character transformation videos
internal_platforms_served: RHS (Remote Helpers) - Tutorial videos, skills demonstrations
Viral Content Creation - Sound effects and character voice design for viral video hooks

limitations: Can sound robotic if not tuned properly
